Articles.Content:
I'll put the pic first:

That's a sample LV-T45 I made.

(Please disregard the idea of being able to clip parts first)

I've got this idea where we can make varied engine designs despite only having one.

Imagine when you can shroud the top of your engine with tanks/adapters. Makes engines more compact and new design.

Upgrades such as nozzle extension to handle more thrust/ISP or maybe change performance on vacuum.

This also suggests removal of the upper plate which messes up engine clustering.

Overall just roughly an idea.
Attachable parts and upgrades to engines would be awesome! I like the idea of the extension nozzle.
Cool idea. Will steal for fun, practice and profit.

Cool idea. Will steal for fun, practice and profit.

What you mean steal? You making it? I'll look forward if you do
